dimensions:

title: Ancient brick, with stamp of Brutian brick works
inscriptions: on stamp: EX. PR. T. STATIL. MAX (.SEV.HAD)/ BRV. EX. OF. M[Y] (RINI)/ Ex praedis Titi Statilii Maximi Severi Hadriani Brutiana ex officina Myrini./ "The property of Titus Statilius Maximus Severus Hadrianus; from the Brutian Brickworks at/ Myrinus"
